metadata.title: CVE-2021-29469 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Node-redis is a Node.js Redis client. Before version 3.1.1, when a clientis in monitoring mode, the regex begin used to detected monitor messagescould cause exponential backtracking on some strings. This issue could leadto a denial of service. The issue is patched in version 3.1.1.

criterions.comment: node-redis package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
